entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Marystown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:57 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winterland Branch Hill 09:30 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -11.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -17.6°C
Wind: 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16 except minus 21 north of Terrenceville.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 16 except minus 21 north of Terrenceville. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
